en-US.summary: Explore music releases using the Discogs database
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask discogs to list releases by The Beatles
Alexa, ask discogs to search for Abbey Road
Alexa, ask discogs for a random release
en-US.name: Discogs Explorer
en-US.description: Explore the vast world of music with Discogs Explorer! This skill lets you search for music releases, discover albums by your favorite artists, and get random music recommendations from the comprehensive Discogs database. Whether you're looking for classic albums, rare releases, or want to discover something new, this skill has you covered.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: To test this skill, try saying: 'list releases by The Beatles', 'search for Dark Side of the Moon', or 'give me a random release'.
